House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07374
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROMOTING SOCIAL ENTERPRISE PROGRAM IN THE COUNTRY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELARO, SALVADOR JR. B.
DATE FILED : 2018-03-12
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Nieto (000 2018-01-25)2. Sangcopan (000 2018-01-25)
3. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-03-21)4. Bravo (M.) (000 2018-05-30)
5. Gonzales (A.P.) (000 2018-05-30)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2018-05-29
          -The Committee approved the following: 1. That all members present in the previous and meetings be made co-authors of the bills, (Rep. Fortun, duly seconded by Rep.Borilla). 2. Consolidation of the eight (8) bills with HB 7457 as the template for ease of consolidation; 3. Creation of a Technical Working Group (TWG) with CSBED Chairman Peter “Sr.Pedro” M. Unabia as TWG Chair together with Rep. Lianda B. Bolilia of the Committee on Poverty Alleviation as Co-Chair, and with Reps. Democrito Mendoza and Marisol Panotes as members thereof.
          -Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) jointly with the Committee on Poverty Alleviation.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON MICRO, SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE DEVELOPMENT ON 2018-03-14
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON POVERTY ALLEVIATION
